code: var BASE_URL="https://register.nomoreparties.co";var checkServerResponse=function checkServerResponse(res){return res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject("Error: ".concat(res.status));};var login=function login(_ref){var email=_ref.email,password=_ref.password;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkServerResponse);};var signup=function signup(_ref2){var email=_ref2.email,password=_ref2.password;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkServerResponse);};var verifyJWT=function verifyJWT(jwt){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(jwt)}}).then(checkServerResponse);};export{login,signup,verifyJWT};
